parameterKey.description: The key of the parameter. The options are `auto_mv`, `datestyle`, `enable_case_sensitive_identifier`, `enable_user_activity_logging`, `query_group`, `search_path`, `require_ssl`, `use_fips_ssl`, and [query monitoring metrics](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/redshift/latest/dg/cm-c-wlm-query-monitoring-rules.html#cm-c-wlm-query-monitoring-metrics-serverless) that let you define performance boundaries: `max_query_cpu_time`, `max_query_blocks_read`, `max_scan_row_count`, `max_query_execution_time`, `max_query_queue_time`, `max_query_cpu_usage_percent`, `max_query_temp_blocks_to_disk`, `max_join_row_count` and `max_nested_loop_join_row_count`.

parameterValue.description: The value of the parameter to set.
